Establish a connection to a DBMS

Source: R/connect.R
connect.Rd

connect is a wrapper around dbPool to connect to a SQLite or Postgres database using the specified driver and additional authentication parameters (host, user and password).

Usage

connect(dbname = "drp", driver = RPostgres::Postgres(), pool = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

dbname

Name of the database

driver

Database driver to use, either RSQLite::SQLite() or RPostgres::Postgres()

pool

Boolean indicating whether the package 'pool' (TRUE) or 'DBI' (FALSE) should be used for database connection

...

Additional arguments to pass to dbPool, i.e. host, user, password, sslmode

Value

A DBIConnection-class object to a DRP database
